text: boom DMB am i in portugal right now
or perhaps india brazil no this is
Mozambique a combination of the three
countries and one of the most culturally
interesting places I've ever been
I'm here in Maputo the capital and
largest city known for its distinct
architecture crazy nightlife beautiful
beaches and a vibrant cultural scene
with many restaurants and markets really
every single street corner is a market
here but there's a twist everyone speaks
Portuguese all the street signs are in
Portuguese the currency is in Portuguese
people communicate in Portuguese and in
fact I'm struggling to get by with
English so I've been speaking Spanish
because they can understand me easier
how bizarre is that well I do know a few
Portuguese words from here this is a
cappella fellow and it's indeed was a
big I didn't realize that Mozambique was
a Portuguese colony until coming here
and after a little research I discovered
that Portuguese colonies were formed
along the Maputo coast from 1498 the
modern city as it exists today can trace
its roots back to this portuguese fort
built in 1781
even though mozambique gained
independence in 1975 it's been a huge
shocker to see such strong Portuguese
influence everywhere I go I thought it'd
be like Macau another colony of Portugal
where the language is not commonly
spoken anymore but I'm wrong it's
exactly like Brazil here and how about
the food it wasn't hard for me to find
some grilled garlic shrimp with minutos
peri-peri chicken so chicken ears are
really freakin good fresh coconuts whoa
Goku yes I would be cool getting some
coconuts here
and seafood heaven the long coastline
means seafood is as fresh as a kid and
this fish market is the place to be
I'm talking about massive fish overall
I'm finding my puto to be hectic
colorful and wild but I'm enjoying every
second of it
I highly recommend coming to Mozambique
if you want to see Portugal India and
Brazil in Africa I'm driven ski and if
you like my videos please click
Subscribe and join me as I plan to visit
every country in the world
